website_summaries.verdict: The lower-priced D3 has a shorter battery life than other models, but it will return to its dock to recharge up to three times to get the job done.
pros: Works with Amazon Alexa for voice control
WiFi connected for remote control app
LaserSmart mapping scans and maps room
Spin flow power cleaning ideal for dirt, crumbs and dust bunnies
Cleans where dirt hides – close to walls and deep into corners
Returns to charging station if needed to complete job – for up to three cycles
Runs up to 60 minutes after a full charge
cons: XFinity Comcast modems do not communicate well with the D3

website_summaries.verdict: Frugal shoppers looking to score an affordable and app-linked robot vacuum should look into the Neato Botvac D3 Connected, but pet owners won't be happy with its cleaning power.
pros: The Neato Botvac D3 Connected is the least expensive robot vacuum we've ever tested
Despite its affordable price, it's a true smart appliance that links to Wi-Fi networks and communicates with a companion mobile app
It cleans floors efficiently and across multiple rooms too
You can also program it to clean automatically on a schedule
cons: It often gets stuck when trying to pick up pet hair
It lacks features that are standard in more expensive Neato robots such as a side brush, special cleaning modes and boundary markers
It runs slowly compared to Neato's set-up models

customer_reviews.title: ... and watched videos for every single one of these stupid things in every brand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read tons of reviews and watched videos for every single one of these stupid things in every brand. It’s a little scary purchasing something this expensive and seeing all the reviews for all of them are basically the same. This actually works better than I expected and filter clean up is simple. This actually gets in Tom of my shag rug that’s super thick and gets it clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Moore

customer_reviews.title: Has Larger capacity and larger filters, much quieter than the old ones.
customer_reviews.text: Love the New Neato Robotics Botvac D3 Wi-Fi Connected Vacum. Has Larger capacity and larger filters, much quieter than the old ones. the New App makes it easy to start your cleaning. no more bending over to hit the button and try to read the screen. (which has gone out in one of our Neato's)
customer_reviews.author: B A S

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this robotoc vacuum. I was worried that it would be hard to program or require a lot of ongoing care, but that is not the case. You simple take it out of the box, attach it to the base, set up your cleaning schedule, and it does everything else. I have 3 dogs, so I need to empty the dog hair out of the bin with each use, but no complaints here. It also works with alexa by enabling the neato skill-- it couldn't be more convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: 1/20/19 - Won't start, constantly says to clean brush despite it being clean. Believe the rotation sensor has failed. 7/19/18 - Second day review. Easy to setup, worked right away. I was a bit confused as I thought it was supposed to map, but after 2 updates, it worked. Map came through and it did an excellent job cleaning up (really gross as we have a chocolate lab shedding right now). Works well with Alexa, minor annoyance is you need to say pause cleaning and resume after it is started rather than stop and start as they are different commands to it....Very, very minor annoyances. We are very satisfied with it so far. Scheduled it to do a daily cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Dealseaker2025

customer_reviews.title: Neato D3 Connected: If only it worked.
customer_reviews.text: When it runs this cleans floors very well but connects to operate only intermittently. Yes, we tried it on multiple Wi-Fi networks and with the App loaded on several phones. At it’s best any time it popped offline it would take 10 or 15 tries before it re-linked. For the past 6 weeks it has just been dead. Neato “Customer Service” works even less. We’ve been exchanging emails but for the past month it’s apparent they are ignoring the situation. My theory is that these issues are rampant and they are hoping to bank new sales before design flaws catch up to them. You’d be better off with a different vacuum, this one is a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent for now.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad not bad at all.... probably it cleans more and better than I would do :-) . So money well spent for now. Will see how long the battery life will last and how much part I need to change with in an year. Shipping fast and box was perfect. Only cons is a 10 inch of cord that basically does not let you place the charger anywhere but in front of the outlet. I don't have outlet available with the room that it needs...I will have to but an extension to place it in a better place. They cul have given a longer cord.
customer_reviews.author: dario berardinelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have mix opinions about Neato.. for my house, I have purchased 3 before and I also purchased 2 for my system and 2 for another family member. This case, product did not work after one week. The lifetime, in my opinion is too short. I have purchased 3 on the period of 5 years so my suggestion... must purchase with extend warrant.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Medium to high pile carpet is a go
customer_reviews.text: Great robo vac especially if you have medium to high pile carpet. This vacuum acts more like a regular vacuum with it's suction and power first and the robot automation second. It had some issues finding the base a couple times but was able to clean my 700 square foot apartment in 45 minutes easily including my medium shag rug with no issues. The laser mapping is a neat tool as well to see where it has cleaned vs hasn't gone yet. I have this currently integrated with my smartthings hubs and alexa for a better automation experience to clean when everyone has left the home during certain hours.
customer_reviews.author: Probar

customer_reviews.title: Quickie clean up approved!
customer_reviews.text: We love our "Furrocious" Neato vacuum. It's nice to be able to go run errands and have your vacuum clean up while your out; great multitasker. Don't count on this for a deep clean. Our 1500 sq, ft, house takes about three "trips" for the vacuum to complete vacuuming all of our floors. TIP: empty the bin in-between "trips" for best results. Replace the filter every 8-10th full cleaning, brush the filter to clean dust build-up between "trips" with a used, dry toothbrush. One thing, it doesn't always complete a it's cycle due to internet connectivity loss. Also make sure to clean it's path of small items it could pick up that will stop it's work.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: I did NOT want to like this Neato vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: My husband insisted on purchasing the Neato D3 in July 2018. I was very skeptical about how good a job it would do. Well, I LOVE IT! We run it daily on tile, wood, and medium pile carpet. The app is great and is automatically updated to fix bugs and add new features. We did have a problem 10 months in with an error code on the unit that could not be resolved by trouble shooting over the phone with Customer Support, so they paid to have it shipped to them, repaired, and returned to us. We are very happy with the Neato and their Customer Support and plan on never being without one.
customer_reviews.author: TeaJay

customer_reviews.title: Great value great product.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a really nice robot. Notes: 1. Its a bit clunky at first--but it learns quick 2. The white color actually looks really nice in my home--looks modern and compliments the white trim in my house. 3. Be aware that the turrent causes it to have an even lower clearance--meaning it might get caught on furniture that sits low 4. it loves to climb items that have a slant to them...such as Christmas tree legs 5. the app works really well--sends notifications and lets you schedule as many different cleaning schedules as you want. Even lets you know when the robot is stuck or needs the bin emptied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Humes

customer_reviews.title: It really does have smart mapping!
customer_reviews.text: We tried lower price points on other brand bots and still ended up back with Botvac after our original Botvac Connected died. This one still does the job without some of the extra bells & whistles the Botvac Connected has and we love it. The smart mapping really works - it rarely gets stuck and when it does it is totally our bad for leaving something dragging on the floor that could get caught up in it. It even cleans around the dog toys that get left out on occasion. And it does respect the magnetic strip boundaries without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit delivered :(
customer_reviews.text: Spent 45 mins trying to set it up with customer service. It connected to wifi but the unit was defective (per the rep). Now I have the pain in the butt to return it and wait several days for a replacement. Cmon quality control...
customer_reviews.author: L. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this... but
customer_reviews.text: This thing is more of a hassle than a help. When it works, it works great. But, this thing got stuck on EVERYTHING. And every day, when I came home, I'd be greeted by "beeping" because it was stuck on something (this thing makes a TON of noise all the time, you cannot turn off the beeping). I also had a heck of a time getting it to work with my routers - I probably spent 4 hours troubleshooting and even when I finally got it to connect, I'd open the app and it'd say "disconnected" constantly. When it did work, it was great. I sent it back. Good riddance.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Little to learn, but excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Saw other reviews talking about connection issues. I've seen that too, but a little discovery and it wasn't the robot, it was my phone. Wifi-on/off and fixed. The phone switches to wifi when local and that was goofing the routes. Their software does a really great job considering the varied environments. Did require an update. Suggest you do this as soon as connected. Love the schedule and no-go areas. Lidar is the way to go! It does the job and I don't have to think about. It lets me know if it needs to be emptied and waits on me. Everything I wanted in a robot vacuum. Just bought a second for upstairs. :D
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE CHAFFINS

customer_reviews.title: Mechanical issues before a full year of use
customer_reviews.text: Recently our neato has started malfunctioning. It will attempt to start cleaning but fail and then try to clean a couple times before you receive an error telling you to reboot it. Rebooting it does not work. Taking out the battery does not work. Cleaning it does not work. Edit: Found the problem. The O-ring that drives the small pulley for the laser snaped and the pulley was severely clogged with hair. A stronger and thicker o-ring could have helped prevent this issue as well as a better seal for the pulley.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Just a big disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to try this bot! Got it set up and it would not connect to our phone or laptop. Tried to run it without connecting and all it did was move out from the charger and go in a circle before declaring itself in trouble! Gave it to my daughter and it connected to her laptop. It did ok for 3 months and just quit! She spent about 2 weeks trying to get help from the company and at one point wanted her to send it in but then changed their mind. They kept giving her a list of things to try and each list was a repeat of the list before! Totally worthless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I like my Neato. I've been using it for about 6 months now with no major problems only small snafus. The vacuum sucking power is pretty strong. Picks up pet hair very effectively. I'm actually surprised at how much debris is actually on my floors! I will say that from time to time it will get disoriented and die before returning to the charging station. I think that might have something to do with the sensors not being clean. You have to clean those with a Q-tip periodically. But, it does its job and saves me time. It senses stairs very well and will not tumble down. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Off line most of the time - beware of smart feature!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many robotic botvacs over the years. Neato was always my favorite until this model. The only way this botvac works is via your phone on-line but, this botvac was constantly off-line or stuck. I had to reprogram it every single day sometimes twice a day. I spoke with the manufacturer and they had me reset this botvac quite a few times. After 2 weeks I returned it. It never stuck to my programed schedule as it was always off line. Give me a botvac wihout smart features any day ....Neato needs to go back to the drawing board on this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked great but had limited scheduling
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this little botvac but upgraded to the D7 model because we needed multiple schedules and the ability to clean multiple areas at different times. Every 3 hours it vacuums around the littler boxes to keep the littler cleaned up. We love our botvacs. just spend 10 minutes cleaning them every weekend and they will last forever. forget to clean them and you'll have nothing but problems. for the 10 minutes of cleaning per botvac each week, it easily saves us 2-3 hours of vaccuming a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amaizing Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have got one sooner
customer_reviews.text: By using my Neato every day, my floors are much cleaner. Once you get your area mapped out, which was easy peasy from the app, setting the schedule also easy and drawing your no-go lines, you pretty much set it and forget it. Just make sure you clean the "bag" every day. This thing picks up a lot. I have rough slate floors which are uneven, a dog and a cat, and the amount of hair this bot picks up is amazing, especially since I vacuum every day. I bought a "used" model from Amazon warehouse and it looked brand new. Saved a few bucks too.
customer_reviews.author: Devveldogg

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is the first robot vacuum that I have owned. I tried to do as much research as I could before making a purchase. I found that the Neato D3 fit my needs perfectly. Especially with the recent addition of "no-go" lines in the app. Neato added this feature to their whole line up of "D-series" vacuums. I will admit that I did just purchase this and have only had it run for a few times. But so far I am extremely happy with its cleaning ability and how well it navigates.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Krauss

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to use and does a terrific job
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave about this vacuum enough. It is so easy to use and does a terrific job! I run it almost everyday and my house looks so much cleaner and we have two long haired dogs, a rabbit and a five year old that loves glitter. On top of the great job it does, cleaning out the dirt bin is so simple compared to other vacuum. Oh and cleaning off the roller...super simple. ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Diane Burress

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG FOR A DOORSTOP, TOO INEFFICIENT FOR A VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: This is an old-style Neato. Previously, I had an old style Roomba. While my old Roomba did a reasonably good job, this machine just doesn't pick up enough, to make it look like the carpet has been vacuumed---I'd say 25% of visible crud is left behind. My carpet is a medium gray, which I understand can add to the problem... I wish I had either gotten a newer model, which MIGHT have solved some of the problems, or just gone with a cordless Dyson (which I have since). It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: vee

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't have been happier more
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. And must for any home. This was the first product I bought before moving to our home and happiest. Cleaning effort reduced significantly and overall saved so much rather than wasting on home cleaners. Run them once a week and home is all done clean.
customer_reviews.author: Atul Singh

customer_reviews.title: Made life easier not having to vacuum as often.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Doesn’t get stuck too often. Has trouble staying connected to my WiFi which could be an in issue with my WiFi. Doesn’t always alert me when the dust bin is full or it has finished cleaning. It does good on the hard wood and carpet. Has trouble getting over the threshold into my kitchen. Edit: still dropping WiFi. Now it’s pretty much once a week. Sucks. When it works it great, but seems to not work anymore than it does. Worse part about it is when it drops WiFi it doesn’t run its schedule. Dropping it to 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Smoke

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Little Bot =)
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little robot for this price point. By the second use it was able to find it's way back to dock, and had a pretty good map of my house. I have 2 dogs, and this will really help with that battle. Amazing how much hair this thing picks up, and even that stray piece of dog kibble. Works fantastic on solid floors ie: hardwood, tile, laminate, etc. not as impressive on carpet. My home is mostly hardwood with a couple throw rugs, so this is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: casper7256

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our Neato D3, we affectionately named her Rosie (the Jetsons of course) and we are so happy that we purchased her! The perfect carpet lines make my OCD brain so happy. She picks up an impressive amount of hair and dirt (we have two labs, and currently a dirt backyard). We had a Roomba previously, and because of the systematic approach that the Neato does, in my opinion it cleans more thoroughly. We could not be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how much dirt he collects for us
customer_reviews.text: Our D3, Linus, has cleaned carpets and hardwood spectacularly. It's amazing how much dirt he collects for us. We run him several times a week and are quite pleased. He gets stuck occasionally, but that's usually easily remedied and he keeps on cleaning. Occasionally, he just gives up. The absent side sweep brush has not been a problem. It would be great if he had the larger battery of the D5 (support said his software doesn't support it), but he recharges automatically whenever needed. Big jobs take a few recharges. With kids, we don't use scheduling because we have to make sure legos are picked up or bedroom doors closed.
customer_reviews.author: Pseudonymous Expositor

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used robotic vacuums for 10 years. This is my 10th one. I keep two at a time. This new technology is even better yet. One is 1 year old and other one is 3 mos. old. The battery on the older one is not vacuuming as long as it did but a year of lots of use and still going strong is a good thing with these little wonders! I hate upright vacs although you have to have one for certain things. Love the robots!
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Neato review
customer_reviews.text: I like the pattern the Neato follows. It seems to cover the whole floor. I would have liked some kind of self-cleaning brush or something to clean the brush because my daughter has long hair, and it gets tangled up in the brush. However, it does pick up a lot of the hair. I bought my mother-in-law a Shark, and it is just ok because of the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H Holder

customer_reviews.title: We love our Neato!
customer_reviews.text: For the past few months, we have wondered why Neato seemed to have lost suction. After calling Neato robotics directly, we were connected with a very friendly Irishman named Dermot. Not only did he quickly diagnose and remedy the problem over the phone (the 5 year old's Beyblade was lodged in front of the intake area behind the brush), but he did so without treating us like idiots. He also helped me update the app which includes features I almost paid $100+ for previously. We purchased the Neato off a recommendation from a work friend who had researched (and used) a number of robotic vacuums. Our Neato is fantastic and the new features in the app make it a steal!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ruri

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. Works just as well as the robot vacuums ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Works just as well as the robot vacuums that are twice the price (the only downside is no side brush). The post-cleaning map is a GENIUS feature, helpful in case the vacuum gets stuck somewhere and you want to see which rooms got cleaned and which didn't. I was pleasantly surprised that it was able to get over the 3/4" lip in my doorways (makes a huge racket hobbling over it but who cares if I'm not home?). this guy runs everyday in my ~450 apartment and cleans the whole thing in one swoop, parks itself back in the dock, and I only have to empty it every ~3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Owens

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to work for long... And terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love these vacuums... I've had 2 of them and they are great but unfortunately they last for a maximum if 2.5 years. Both of mine stopped working and when I contacted support, I was told there is nothing they can do unless I am willing to ship it across the country to one of the 2 authorized maintenance providers and pay for repair... Probably more than what the vacuum cost originally. It's really too bad that the customer service is so crappy because the vacuums do a great job, if you don't mind shelling out $300+ every 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ward

customer_reviews.title: A cleaner floor starts here!
customer_reviews.text: Husband and Dads, if you want to be a hero, get someone special to you one of the Neato Botvacs. These are far superior to the ibots, there is structure to their cleaning instead of random cleaning. My wife has stated many times how clean the floor is now because it gets vacuum everyday! We have both the connected version and the D80 series. Both are fantastic, if you are a techie get the connected version! Lots of neat things you can do!
customer_reviews.author: Rondle M Beasley Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Connected Robot Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The Botvac D3 does a thorough job at cleaning all parts of the house, whether it tile, rug, or carpet. It usually takes 2-3 charges to clean a >2,000 sq ft. of house. Bedrooms are cleaned separately. The ability for the Botvac to correctly survey the room and clean it is astounding and was the reason why I returned the Roomba vacuum. I wasn't too keen on splurging $200 more for the D5 for a bigger battery and a spinning side brush. Battery life on the D3 is my biggest complaint and wish it could be upgraded but it can't. Ultimately that means it takes a bit longer to clean the house than the D5 would. All-in-all, a great performer.
customer_reviews.author: Erik A

customer_reviews.title: Back to the roomba I go
customer_reviews.text: This is not comparable to the low level roomba. I had two roombas that both died so thought I would try the neato. What a bad idea. Never charges, gets lost, tries to go up the walls or furniture, and doesn’t follow its schedule. It also doesn’t clean corners at all. Huge waste of $
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: This is my third NEATO and by far the better unit. Its ability to track and vacuum the whole house with limited supervision is impressive. I like the connection via cell phone app vs the older style touch panel which required you to get down on the floor with the unit to perform software instructions. You also have full control of the unit via wifi supported apps.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Ling Clendennen

customer_reviews.title: Not made like they used too!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t clean like previous non-WiFi, my third attempt at the newer style and I’m not trying a fourth. I was a faithful Neato customer but these new Botvac versions don’t map and clean like the previous generations. If you’re telling me I have to step up to the $700 model to get it to actually clean a one bedroom apartment, I’m saying call me when you put all the technology available in more expensive models in your whole product line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: neato is very neato!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and it is a wonderful machine. He loves it. Great for dog hair. he says he still hasnt used the smart phone app yet but he will. Cleanest floors ever! p.s. i have another Neato for me and i had some issues with it, but i have to say Neato stepped up to the plate made everything right as rain and i absolutely love this product and the Neato itself. it is truly a great machine and a great company...
customer_reviews.author: restaurantlady

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy and can not be trusted operating alone
customer_reviews.text: I have worked with this robot for nearly a month and it is not worth the high price tag. It is not nearly smart enough and often got lost returning to base, could not follow no-go-lines and had a very glitchy application product. It was effective in a single square carpeted room with no furniture. However, once furniture was added and other rooms were included, the robot could not be trusted to run alone, which was the primary reason for the purchase. Customer support was helpful during the first issues with app connectivity, however issues persisted after the initial troubleshooting.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon  Newman

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Wifi and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We have one of these, the white one and so far its been good so we bought another and its been horrible , the unit keeps reporting "offline" then connecting, sometimes it resumes others not. The wifi signal seems drop at random, the other unit in the same area does not, Customer service basically just tells you to delete and pair the unit, we even tried a different wifi source, unit is shipping back after one week.
customer_reviews.author: Attn4d

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: disappointed Lot’s of bumping into furniture, getting stuck under furniture and going around in circles around the furniture’s legs .... Never quite “hitting “ the center of the room and the center of the area rug. .. Short battery life ... (charged for 1.5 hrs to only last barely 30 min of going around in circles).
customer_reviews.author: Angelika R.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the new Neato
customer_reviews.text: I had and older model that dead on me and I decided to get another one. I really like the new Neato, they are quieter then the older version. It was very easy to set and paired with my phone. It picked up a lot of dirt in the house, and it returned to it doc to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Kaden

customer_reviews.title: Poor support from neato.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product constantly disconnects from WiFi. Neato support is no help at all. Shopping for a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this vacuum! Issues 2 weeks after purchase. Tech support has been useless. A very expensive mistake. Just dont buy it. UPDATE so here we are 7 months later. Several emails to tech support with the same results. I was told by Neato I would be refunded for my purchase. They emailed today to tell me since I purchased from Amazon they would not be refunding me for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Robot Vacuum D3
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum work superbly from day one. This is my fourth Neato, but the first D series - the others were xv models. I still use an xv-21 on a different level of my house. I like being able to program barriers on D3 using the app along with pausing or starting a cleaning cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, lazier than your kids.
customer_reviews.text: Loved her when I first got here, she had her quirks but it got the job done. But after a year she now constantly get stuck in random spots, and is too dumb to get home (see photo). Never finishes job. Would not buy again. No furniture has moved yet she never followed the same route now feel terrible that I bought this for the mother in law for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: `*Lane*`

customer_reviews.title: Works good till it finds a tissue or a paper clip ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good till it finds a tissue or a paper clip then it gets jamed. It got lost under my bed one day and I had to pull it out of a tight corner. Still use it every week. Dust bin is not big enough for shaggy dogs. It does a good job of getting all the hair n dust till the small bin fills up. Have to use 2ice a week n it's great then. Always parks itself in the charger then shuts off.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Best vacumn ever
customer_reviews.text: Best vacumn ever!!!I have a dog that sheds a lot and this vacumn does an excellent job getting hair up. This vacumn is so easy to use. I also like that it shows a map of vacumn activity. Amazing product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sarah Stone

customer_reviews.title: Army clean
customer_reviews.text: My first choice was the Roomba 675. After two days it started to squeak. I returned the Roomba for the Neato D3. Now the Roomba was my first and I loved it till the squeaky noise. An then I got my Neato and this thing is amazing! I’m kinda happy that the Roomba broke after two days. I love the app. I love the way it cleans. The suction is amazing and 2X more then the other! I hate the filters. I wish they had a Roomba filter. The housing is HUGE but the battery sucks. I did find that they make an extended battery and it is amazing and twice the charge. I’m done do your on research.
customer_reviews.author: ally guilmette

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I have made hands down
customer_reviews.text: We love our Neato robot. The fact that I can turn it on anytime I want is awesome. Its great to come home to a house thats been vacuumed. You will need to make sure things that can easily tangle in the vacuum are picked up, but other then that its an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Neato. We have a Neato Botvac connected downstairs and now the D3 upstairs. In comparing the the D3 to the Botvac connected, the D3 lacks a screen, lacks a side brush, has a shorter battery life and comes with the basic filter. Despite missing those things, it cleans exceptionally well. I actually like the app better for the D3. You get a cleaning map so you can see where it has cleaned and it does a good job notifying you if it gets stuck. I think the Neato's are superior to the other robot vacuums and would not hesitate to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Meh, do your research before buying
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Neato I’ve owned. I’ve had to send in twice for repairs to the laser. The laser eye sticks up above the robot, causing it to get stuck easily underneath furniture. This is probably the last one I purchase bc of th hassle of it getting stuck underneath most things in my home. I love the convenience of it when it’s working!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, but not to its best.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it since I watched some videos in China, which says Neato has the most advanced technology in navigation. It did the best work compared with other products, but it didn't do the perfect work as I expected. The machine is still incapable of some corners, some room beneath the chair, the room beneath the sofa whose height is about to the machine. Sometimes, It could miss one or two rooms, even if the map shows the room was available to clean. I would like to give a 4 stars out of 5 to this machine, since it is capable to do his work in most circumstances, leaving rooms to improve...
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: No Go Zones made this product worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: When we first got this robot we hated it. It got stuck under all of our living room furniture so we had to rescue it or chase it around to prevent it from going under things. But then Neato updated the software and allowed No Go Zones. We made the sofa and entertainment center no go zones and it doesn’t get stuck anymore. Now that we can tell it where not to go, we are planning to buy a second one for the front of the house. The battery life is enough for about 2 rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Soden

customer_reviews.title: Great robot
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum !! I run every day when I'm gone . I live in a single wide mobile home (720 sqft. ) It's done in about 20 minutes ! I hate vacuuming !!!! Now when I get home it's cleaned !!! Great maping remembers where things are I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Rodger B. Terrey

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is ridiculous and customer service is somewhere out of the US. You cannot understand these people. I had to make 2 separate phone calls and finally hung up on them after trying over and over and over repeating the same thing top get them to understand. I truly regret spending all this money on this piece of junk that no one will help Me fix!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Best investment of my life
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I’ve ever made. We have 2 dogs who shed like crazy. Our Neato took about 2 cleanings to “learn” the rooms. He makes quick work of it, very rarely gets stuck. I have him set to clean every day at 10am. He cleans, goes back to base to charge, and picks up where he left off. I do wish the battery lasted longer, but it goes back and charges up to 3 times. I would highly reccomend buying the upgraded “ultra performance filters” they are worlds easier to clean and much better quality. They last much longer also.
customer_reviews.author: Mookie Man

customer_reviews.title: Robot overlords are here,  and I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible value at $200. Was difficult to get on my wifi, but that was most likely because another device was messing with my network at the time. Set the same robot up at my parents in a couple minutes. Have 3 neatos. Bought all three for the price of one of the competitors.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Made this working mom's life so much better
customer_reviews.text: I have a little robot that cleans my kitchen and family room floor every night so I don't have too. It's amazing. He also cleans the floors throughout the house before parties while I do the rest of the cleaning. I just love him.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it’s worth the money-it works that well.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I debated over more expensive brands, was nervous about how good it would work. Thankfully a friend has this exact model and raves about it. She was right! We have to pick up throw rugs so it doesn’t damage them, but other than that, no complaints. And as great of a job it does, I’m not even complaining about that. We have tile floors, live in FL so we have lots of sand and have a boxer that sheds a decent amount. This does an EXCELLENT job of picking up all debris on the ground. Much better than other hand held vacuums I’ve tried. Definitely happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS ROBOT!
customer_reviews.text: We love our neato, named now Iron Tiny! My floors are super clean, and I have 2 young boys and a puppy. We set up the schedule to run thru the app and get notifications on the phone for things. I don't why it took me so long to get it. I am very glad I got the connected instead of the standard model.
customer_reviews.author: MedGirlD

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service. Fixed my out of warranty robot!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Neato contacted me and fixed my robot at no cost. I’m very grateful and truly believe that this company cares and stand behind their product. Thank you Neato!! My neato lasted about 1.5 years. It suddenly stopped working even though some lights are blinking. Called neato but was told its out of the 1y manufacturer warranty. I’m highly disappointed at the customer service response and that this product doesn’t last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Welch

customer_reviews.title: Had this thing for a little while now
customer_reviews.text: and it's super great. It cleans my 450 SF ground floor in about one hour and does a great job picking up the pet hair (I have a shiba inu which means A LOT of hair) on the hardwood floor and even on the low pile dark area rug. It doesn't get stuck too often, and is easy to empty and clean. Had a few issues with it needing to be reset a few times, but overall a great time saver and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B. Heal

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This robot was the single best purchase we made. We have a dog that sheds a lot and coming back home from work to find the floors clean every day is so rewarding. Its navigation around furniture is top notch. No-go lines are extremely useful. Just wish it had the option to vacuum a single area only; instead, I use no-go lines to tell it to not go everywhere BUT the area I want. Probably a more expensive model does that, but definitely a good value for your investment
customer_reviews.author: Talita

customer_reviews.title: This is not a "want", it is a "NEED".
customer_reviews.text: I just love our neato. It works without any issues does a fantastic job every time. We almost never bring out the real vacuum anymore. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: If you have a shedding monster...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is ahhhhmazing! We have shepherd who sheds 365 days a year. She also happens to have just blown her coat.... 🤦🏻‍♀️ We bought this in an attempt to mitigate the furpocalypse and... it's helping!!!! We had a roomba before and it was like a drunken sailor. It didn't clean systematically and the container was small. This neato, on the other hand, fixes all our problems with the roomba and then some!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: Very stupid robot and stopped working after 22 months
customer_reviews.text: My parent have a cheaper robot at their house which worked much smarter than this one. It often stuck at places where I think it shouldn't. It's not quiet at all. It stopped working after 22 months. I searched for exhaustively online but still can't make it connect to app or have a single clean again. will NOT BUY from NEATO AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Su

customer_reviews.title: This little thing cleans better than my upright
customer_reviews.text: I thought these things were all hype, I was wrong.This little thing cleans better than my upright.
customer_reviews.author: Delnaga

customer_reviews.title: Designed obsolescence
customer_reviews.text: Love the neatos but this one just died after only 2 years. They need more longevity. This is our second one and the first lasted about the same. Awesome while they last.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Cleans okay, mostly reliable, sometimes randomly fails, docking from the ap does not work.
customer_reviews.text: It does pretty good, but it sometimes stops and says it needs to shutdown. I don't know why. Also, sometimes it loses it's wifi connection. Strangely, the dock button is always grayed out, so if I stop a cleaning run, I have to go and find it and put it back on it's base by hand. Why doesn't the docking option work?
customer_reviews.author: Joegr

customer_reviews.title: Just not worth the price for the problems
customer_reviews.text: Honestly kind of sad how this turned out. 🙁 WiFi keeps disconnecting from the robot. It could be our internet I’m not completely sure. The app is really crappy and not user friendly. I had to call the company to have them help me and the robot only worked for a couple of days. Its not doing any of the features now and I have to babysit it which isn’t too bad for me but I just don’t think it’s worth $400. If I knew this was how it was going to be I would only pay $200-150 for this product. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Smartest Vacuum Robot
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on carpet and hardwood. I have a 3000 sq feet ranch with all rooms on the same floor. Neato does it in 2 hours which includes one recharge. The technology is amazing (I am a programmer by profession). The robot is extremely smart in manoeuvring around the home. And has got stuck only once. By far the best vacuum robot out there. Things to know before buying. If you have multiple floors, buy the D7 as it can recognize multiple floor plans. If you need high performance filters, you can buy it from other vendors which fit D3.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Now

customer_reviews.title: Overly complicated
customer_reviews.text: It's clear they've scaled back on quality and upped the complexity since previous models. The wifi capability is an unnecessary gimmick that quickly turns into a chore as you repeatedly try to decipher the beeps and lights your device gives you.
customer_reviews.author: Customer_

customer_reviews.title: Every woman should have a NEATO  !!
customer_reviews.text: Wow !! I just love my new NEATO... it not only vacuums my wood floors but it appears to polish them too ! I named mine Maxine and and she is part of the family now ! The customer service is exceptional ... very helpful, courteous and the support person even called me via phone afterwards to see how Maxine was working ! Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my other robot vacuum that had suddenly died. I was nervous but since we started using it we love it so much we named it Tito (get it? Neato Tito) it even cleans my dark carpet and can go into our bedrooms which have a thicker carpet and it works great. I haven't even used my Dyson in weeks cause this picks up so well!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Experience
customer_reviews.text: We have only been using this for about three months and it’s already broken. We have it plugged in but it won’t charge. We followed the instructions but nothing has worked. It’s a real bummer, I feel like it was FINALLY starting to figure out the layout and vacuum the whole floor. I hate to invest in another one after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Flwr07

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Neither my husband or I can get it to connect to the App. It would run by just pressing the button. It won't do that now. It is either in a pairing mode or unsuccessful pairing mode. Will call Amazon for help. I would return it but I'm past return date. So frustrasted, thought it would be simple to use. Not so much
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Connected NOT
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stay connected, each time after a minute or two it stops and has to be reconnected. I have a new dual band WiFi and upgrade my broadband for best signal and even a few feet away it loses connection. I’ve contacted customer support and they had me make sure about Wi-Fi setting which is correct. Tried to contact them again but still haven’t heard back. Im about done with this stupid botvac.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Leslie A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Robot Vac
customer_reviews.text: I have had for a few months now and it’s the Best thing I ever bought on Amazon. This thing is super smart and does everything it says that it does. It takes a few uses for it to learn the house but it works. It made my cleaning life so much better.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaF

customer_reviews.title: Buy New, Refurbished one with bad laser scanner
customer_reviews.text: Buy a new one, the one I bought was "Open box - Good as new" but the laser scanner on the top of the vacuum was dead on arrival. Already contacted Neato Support and they seem really helpful, willing to repair free of charge my unit or even replace it, I'll keep everyone updated
customer_reviews.author: Tomás Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: "Vac Boy" as we like to call him does a great job. We set him to clean at night and we get up every morning to a clean floor. Sure he gets confused and stuck once in a while but that is outweighed by all the nights he doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney May

customer_reviews.title: Simple easy to program
customer_reviews.text: Simple easy to program ... order more filters right away ... I’m watching tv right as this thing is cleaning the floor lol
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The D3 botvac works great so far
customer_reviews.text: The D3 botvac works great so far. We have a tiled floor, and the gloss does not seem to cause any issues. Vacuum power is reasonable for a small unit. But one thing to look out for - the official app is only available in certain countries.
customer_reviews.author: Warn

customer_reviews.title: This is not for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I've used week now and it has not cover the entire floor plan. It's always stock in the same area . If I would of tested it before purchase . I would have not spend the money on this .
customer_reviews.author: YRob

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th robot. The best of all so far. Love the phone reporting (cleaning maps, filter cleaning requests etc.) Supplied filter is a complete crap though. Right after you buy D3 -- replace the filter with the original ULTRA one. Pricey, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Meow

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t last for the whole house (1950ish square feet) And the dirt bin doesnt last more than a cleaning at a time (German Shepherd 😐) but still love It. Hasn’t broken down several times like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Quickly developed an efficient routine. Struggled to find the base for a couple weeks but all is well now. Battery doesn’t last for the whole house (1950ish square feet) And the dirt bin doesnt last more than a cleaning at a time (German Shepherd 😐) but still love It. Hasn’t broken down several times like the shark ion did that I had for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Good, but CONSTANT Wifi Drops
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little robot vac that does a good job when it's working. The problem is it's SUPPOSED to be "connected". The vac drops wifi connection after every cleaning. Only way to reconnect is go through the setup process again to reconnect. Because it drops wifi you don't get your cleaning map or other reminders. Cleans good but falls way short of the advertised capabilities. Support isn't much help and don't seem to want to acknowledge the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Laser technology of Neato Robotics
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Laser technology of Neato Robotics. It is a more calculated clean than iRobot's Saturated cleaning. However, even with its calculated vacuuming, it is not very good at cleaning edges or if it's coming off or going onto something with slightly different elevations. For example, when the robot is going from tile floor to a floor mat (in the kitchen) I find that it does not pick up some debris where the edge of the floor mat and tiles meet.
customer_reviews.author: IronTank

customer_reviews.title: The best in it's price range
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this little robovac is AMAZING. It is efficient and does a great job with pet hair. I have a huge bullmastiff and this thing has done wonders keeping up with the hair everywhere. My only problem, and this is really true with any robovac, is power cords. I don't know why they don't have a sensor to deal with that. My stud finder detects power cords. It should be a no-brainer to put a similar sensor in a robovac.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It works until the job is done and handles pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing! It’s not the newest generation, but it has loads of features. You can set up its cleaning schedule, sends you updates of status of cleaning. I have 950 square feet apartment. It needs to recharge once. It will go to its home automatically and return to its stopping point. Battery life is not a real issue since it will keep recharging and finish the complete job. It has a gentle navigation feature if you have delicate furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Never would connect to wifi!
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of time and money. The unit would never pair with wifi. The app just kept crashing so I was left with a totally non-functional unit. I spent hours with neato tech support trying to get it to work to no avail. They said they would replace the unit, but just kept asking for more info rather then sending me a new unit. I think they were just trying to get past the Amazon return period. Well it goes back tomorrow. I guess I'll try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Fairly reliable. Works best with ultra filters.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it goes offline. It also messages that it needs to be returned to base..called customer service. It helped, but occurred again. Cleans,well. My dog has leaned to put up with Neato. She did run away the first couple times it cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Goldsack

customer_reviews.title: I use the attachments of my upright vacuum cleaner to sweep the filter and it works like a charm. Very easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it better than I thought! I wanted something that would sweep my carpets and it does very well on my carpets. It does run the battery down fast though. Many of the reviews talked about how hard it is to clean the filter, which it is, but I use my attachments of my Hoover vacuum cleaner and it sweeps all of the lint and dust off immediately. Makes it look like a new filter! All in all I love the little vacuum. Would definitely buy another one. She has spoiled me!
customer_reviews.author: Sheo

customer_reviews.title: As far as I know, no robot vacuum is infallible.
customer_reviews.text: So far once it died before going back to the charging station. It will get stuck from time to time, The D3 does not have the rotating brush like the D5. All in all it worked pretty good on sweeping up dirt and light particles. I did not program it to my iPhone, not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: ... something highly rated and that would connect with my smart home. The neato D3 connected satisfied both criteria ...
customer_reviews.text: Looking to get into the Robot Vacuum world I wanted something highly rated and that would connect with my smart home. The neato D3 connected satisfied both criteria and came at a reasonable price point. We have run R-2 (that's its name) daily for about a week now and are quite pleased. It manages to get into the nooks and crannies of our furniture without getting stuck and without running into to too many things. One of the things I find surprisingly excellent is that it really picks up a lot of dirt and pet hair without creating too much noise. We will see how it holds up over time but after 1 week I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for a young family
customer_reviews.text: With 2 young kids, vacuuming is always the last chore on the list. I love that my floors get cleaned multiple times a week now, rather than once a week at best. I schedule Ellie to clean at night and wake to squeaky clean wood floors. She did much better on carpet than our old Hoover. She scans the room and cleans row by row. Also self docks.
customer_reviews.author: ElMoCro

customer_reviews.title: Works well when it works
customer_reviews.text: Not to say it doesn't work often, but there have been several instances where it stops mid cycle for no apparent reason and no notification was sent. I've also had WiFi connection issues as well. I love how it maps out your house and I have not tried the "no go lines" update yet.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN

customer_reviews.title: this device does not follow its own directions.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd. The first was returned because Amazon sent a USED one with its brush clogged w/hair! This one, once connected then somehow it disconnected, refuses to reconnect. I follow the instructions but the instructions do not behave as advertised. I will probably send this one back too unless Neato support helps get it working.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G.

product_meta.title: Neato Botvac D3 Connected Laser Guided Robot Vacuum, Works with Smartphones, Alexa, Smartwatches
product_meta.description: Color:GrayThe Botvac D3 Connected is the perfect cleaning companion for apartments and smaller homes. It features LaserSmart mapping and navigation which continuously scans and maps each room. By doing so, Botvac D3 is able to clean quickly and efficiently while providing the most thorough coverage. Plus, the robot’s D-shape design and large core brush tracks down dirt in corners and along walls better than those round robots. And once the robot is done, see where the robot has cleaned on the Neato app.
feature_bullets: LaserSmart technology intelligently navigates and maps your home, cleaning in straight lines instead of a random pattern.
D-shape design and large core brush gets into corners round robots can’t
Perfect for cleaning on any surface - hardwood, carpet or tile
Get up to 60 minutes of battery life, perfect for an apartment or home.
Auto charge & resume lets your robot return to base to power up and then go back out and pick up where it left off.
Use the Neato app to schedule cleanings daily, every other day, or on a schedule that works for you.
Easily control your robot from your phone, smartwatch, Amazon Echo, and Google Home.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars1,466 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Neato Botvac D3 Connected Includes:Wi-Fi Enabled Robot Vacuum INSTALLED: Standard Filter and Combo Brush Integrated Charge BasePower Cord
